code: import React from"react";import LeadTable from"../components/LeadTable";import ContactTable from"../components/ContactTable";import DealTable from"../components/DealTable";import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dashboard=_ref=>{let{onLogout}=_ref;const username=localStorage.getItem("username");const role=localStorage.getItem("role");const handleLogout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem("token");localStorage.removeItem("role");localStorage.removeItem("username");onLogout();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"topbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{children:["Welcome, ",username," (",role,")"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogout,children:"Logout"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LeadTable,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ContactTable,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DealTable,{})]});};export default Dashboard;
